attributes.action: Make it illegal 2 extend the brexit date without a plan on striking a deal.
attributes.additional_details:
Parliament now want to ask for a further delay beyond 21st october 2019 as time has run down and this again is further costing the public.
Therefore it should be made illegal to ask for an extension without a valid reason/plan to strike a deal. Brexit should not be delayed because mps are still trying to undermine the peoples democratic vote.
attributes.background: Brexit was delayed in march as the deal put forward from eu was rejected. Since then parliament have not resolved the issue but instead wasted time playing political games at a cost of 1bn to the public each month.
